did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physdesc: 61 ms. boxes, 1 oversize box, 15 album boxes, 79 envelopes, 6 linear ft.
did.abstract: Clippings, printed matter, and photographs, relating to activities of the Young Men's Christian Associations of North America.in the United States and Europe during World War I

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
